did.unittitle: New York Trade Union Women's Conference Audio-visual material, 1974

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York Trade Union Women's Conference

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: The folders represent a series of seminars that were held with trade union women staff and leaders which led to the First New York Trade Women's Conference in January, 1974. Preceding the formation of the Coalition of Labor Union Women.

scopecontent.p: Open reel tapes recordings from the first conference.

controlaccess.corpname: New York Trade Union Women's Conference.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: New York Trade Union Women's Conference Audio-visual material #5668 AV. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
